name: Signs of Life
description: Signs of Life is a sci-fi survival sandbox platformer with a combination of procedurally generated and hand-crafted content. You'll explore mysterious locations, Mine blocks for resources, and meet strange (and some familiar) creatures, some of which don't even want to kill you and eat your corpse.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 Compatible Graphics Device Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core 2+ GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 Compatible Graphics Device Storage: 1 GB available space
